resources.string: Safety On The Climbing Wall
Enter Your Name
1. What types of belay are used on climbing wall?
To spot
Top rope
Middle rope
Lead rope
2. Which of the following is not allowed on the rock wall?
Grab your hands and step on the safety lugs.
To climb with rings on fingers of hands.
To climbing and belay with long flowing hair.
To be under a climbing man.
3. In what position is it necessary to carry out the belay of the partner:\n In the sitting position, in lying position or standing?
Enter the correct answer
standing
4. What knots are used to tie a rope to a harness?
Figure of eight knot
Bowline knot
Simple knot
5. In which cases can you skip to clip a quickdraw?
If the braces are not enough for all safety points.
If the area is easy enough.
If it\'s uncomfortable to clip a quickdraw.
It is forbidden to skip to clip a quickdraw.
6. What kind of belay should be used before "to clip" a first bolt?
Self belay
Result
Very good %s! All is correct! You are allowed to practice at the climbing wall!
Try again %s. %d out of 6 correctly.
Please enter your name.
